QuestData.Title: Prophet Khar'zul
QuestData.Description: Prophet Khar'zul is a powerful caster, but he is also underestimating your abilities.$b$bKhar'zul and his forces must be destroyed to protect this village. His death will send a strong message to the Thunder King that we will not be defeated!$b$bYou'll find him on the Isle of Reckoning.
QuestData.RewardText: These events should be learned from, $n.$b$bIt is important that we learn from our history. Had we paid attention to the histories, we may have been able to head this off before it got this far.$b$bEverything that has happened was already foretold, we just didn't know how to read it.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Mishi in Zouchin Village
